testcase.name: Calculate KiwiSaver returement projected balance
testcase.system-out: Given User invoke application...............................................passed And User navigate kiwisaver retirement calculators page.....................passed Then User validate infomation icons of all fields available on the page.....passed Given User enters Current age "30"..........................................passed And selects "Employed"......................................................passed And enters "82000"..........................................................passed And select "4%".............................................................passed And select PIR "17.5%"......................................................passed And enters current kiwisaver balance "".....................................passed And enters voluntary contributions "" and ""................................passed And selects risk profile "High".............................................passed And enters saving goal ""...................................................passed And clicks on View your Kiwisaver retirement projections button.............passed Then Kiwisaver retirement projections display...............................passed
